name: Boeing 737
description: The Boeing 737 is a narrow-body aircraft produced by Boeing Commercial Airplanes at its Renton Factory in Washington.

name: Airbus A320
description: The Airbus A320 family is a series of narrow-body airliners developed and produced by Airbus.

name: Embraer E190
description: The Embraer E-Jet family is a series of narrow-body short to medium-range twin-engine jet airliners.

name: Cessna 172
description: The Cessna 172 Skyhawk is a four-seat, single-engine, high-wing, fixed-wing aircraft.

name: Bombardier CRJ900
description: The Bombardier CRJ900 is a regional jet designed and manufactured by Bombardier Aerospace.
